hero.title: Building the Supply Chain of Tomorrow
hero.subtitle: Flow architect, performance catalyst: I turn logistical challenges into operational successes.

homeAbout.title: An Analytical Mind for Performance
homeAbout.text: With a strong academic background and diverse practical experiences, I combine analytical rigor and creativity to design efficient logistics solutions. My goal: to transform challenges into opportunities and optimize every link in the value chain.
homeAbout.imageAlt: Professional portrait of Anis LATIF, smiling and confident.

homeExp.title: Dive Into My Expertise

homeSkills.title: My Key Skill Areas
homeSkills.subtitle: My training and experiences have allowed me to develop a versatile set of skills, essential for navigating and excelling in the complex world of modern Supply Chain.

manage.title: Manage Resources
manage.learning1: Leadership and motivation of multidisciplinary teams.
manage.learning2: Optimal allocation of resources (human, material, financial).

organize.title: Organize the Supply Chain
organize.learning1: Design and optimization of flows (physical and informational).
organize.learning3: Steering of transport and warehousing operations.

digital.title: Master Digital Tools
digital.learning1: Advanced use of ERP and WMS for operations management.
digital.learning2: Data analysis and Business Intelligence (BI) for decision-making.
digital.learning3: Technological watch and integration of innovative solutions (AI, IoT).

professionalProfile.title: Professional Profile
professionalProfile.subtitle: Apprentice Supply Chain Project Manager at LIDL France

vision.title: My Vision and Goals
vision.philosophy: What I love most is hearing a 'Thank you, Anis' after helping someone, because it makes me feel useful. My definition of the Supply Chain is to help every link in the company perform their tasks under the best possible conditions.
vision.goal: My main goal is to become a major player in the success of a large group in terms of Supply Chain. After that, I am considering the possibility of working abroad.

iata.title: IATA Introductory Cargo Certification
iata.descriptions: Intensive training on air freight fundamentals (in English).|Selected from 50 students, one of 3 winners.|Covers: freight acceptance, pricing, documentation (AWB), basic IATA regulations.

testimonial.title: What people say about me
testimonial.author: Alexandre Vallet, Logistics Manager at KS Holding
testimonial.context: Context: "During a time when logistics was overwhelmed by a lack of adherence to procedures, I kept a cool head to find solutions."
